body_html:
I agree @Hvass-Labs. TensorFlow needs to have world-class documentation that's slick, polished, intuitive, and accessible to everyone. We've got a lot of amazing people who've worked hard to bring our documentation pretty close to that level of quality. Everything else—as @martinwicke pointed out in #3771—goes in contrib.

We encourage you to get involved and help us improve. TensorFlow is a high impact project. Any time you generously choose to volunteer in improving our documentation will pay dividends for the 10,000 people who read it later.

body:
I agree @Hvass-Labs. TensorFlow needs to have world-class documentation that's slick, polished, intuitive, and accessible to everyone. We've got a lot of amazing people who've worked hard to bring our documentation pretty close to that level of quality. Everything else—as @martinwicke pointed out in #3771—goes in contrib.

We encourage you to get involved and help us improve. TensorFlow is a high impact project. Any time you generously choose to volunteer in improving our documentation will pay dividends for the 10,000 people who read it later.
